subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of Cypriots to actively participate in a process of reconciliation strengthened
subproject.description: The project aims to provide services to Greek and Turkish communities in cross boundary cooperation for the construction of a new Waste Water Treatment Plant (WWTP) to enhance the communities’ well being and to protect the shared environment and natural resources. The new WWTP to be constructed at Mia Milia / Haspolat with a total capacity of 30.000 m3/day ) will
subproject.title: New Nicosia Waste Water TP
